CustomField.description: Bill of Material Button in Quote Actions Lightning Component
CustomField.formula: IF( AND(Roll_Up_Of_Proposal_Line_Item__c >0, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c , 'Closed(not won)')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c , 'Expired'))) ,IF(AND (NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'sCRM', NOT(ISPICKVAL(NokiaCPQ_Portfolio__c , 'Modular Private Wireless Solution'))),('/apex/XauthorIntermediatePage?selectedRecordId='+Id+'&appName=Quote Summary&mode=touchless&outputType=EXCEL'),IF(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'sCRM',('/apex/XauthorIntermediatePage?selectedRecordId='+Id+'&appName=BOM-MPW&mode=touchless&outputType=EXCEL'),null)),null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Bill of Material Button in Quote Actions Lightning Component
CustomField.label: Bill of Material Button Field
